summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Pokémon Academy personality questionnaire app. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend flows working correctly with beautiful parchment design.

design_issues.issue: Logout redirects to auth page instead of homepage

passed_tests: Homepage loads with correct 'Accademia Pokémon' title and theme
User registration flow - create account with username, email, password
User login flow - authenticate with email and password
Dashboard displays welcome message and news items
News card for questionnaire is clickable and navigates correctly
Questionnaire displays all 10 questions with multiple choice options
User can select answers and navigate between questions
Quiz submission works and returns personality profile result
Beautiful parchment design with Pokéball and Masterball elements
All backend API endpoints (9/9) working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix: Update logout functionality to redirect to homepage instead of auth page
